job_submit.add_job: Click here to create a new job
job_submit.add_to_pool: Create a vacancy that can then be pushed out or assigned later
job_submit.find_candidates: Create a shortlist of suitable candidates and offer them jobs
job_submit.linked_jobs: Use this when candidates must accept all shifts from the job offer
job_submit.re_push: Resend job offer to available candidates

settings.attributes: Add at least one value in order to use this attribute to submit jobs
